title: "Ping-mutes?! PSCH, who needs THOSE?!"
body:
Riot needs to learn: one does not simply stop ragers by blocking a single communication avenue. You can give them a QUESTION MARK, with ENTIRELY UNRELATED use-purposes, and that is ALL THEY NEED to be unmitigated jerks:

https://youtu.be/lioy_g-VTQE?t=842

Azir:

\*suicide-detours from inner tower while being chased\*
\*spams question marks on someone other than himself\*

replies.body: you could have e'd taric to allow azir to escape

Azir had already escaped. He turned on taric the moment they were back in lane. Just watch the map. Azir was fine, but he didn't WANT to escape, he wanted to kill Taric, as is clear from his initial target-ping (and everything he did thereafter instead of continuing to walk away towards base).
